description: It seems, why Brave's notification sound doesn't work?
summary: Push Notification sound doesn't work for brave, and firefox

description: It's nice but lacks of settings for tray notification counter per application. I am missing some new messages and emails until I check the application itself.

Is there some way to enable telegram notifications on top of fullscreen app? 
It will be great to have "show on fullscre en" switch for apps notifications.
desktop notifications. i hate them. can't disable without conflicts. kde panels crash and don't save settings. delete this trash

Il n'est pas intrusif, il est claire, les notifications sont placées en historique, donc on peut les retrouver meme si on les a manqué.

ça change de Win7 et autres où les notifications n'apparaissent qu'une fois et puis, bonne chance pour savoir à quoi cela correspond.

Superbe travail!
New system notifications are very cool. Thank you for the work done. =)
